statements: DELETE FROM research_publications WHERE publication_topic = 'Machine Learning';
DELETE FROM research_publications WHERE publication_id = 100 AND publication_topic = 'Machine Learning';
DELETE FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date < '2020-01-01' AND publication_citation_count > 50;
